Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.Color

  • Packages that use Color 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.colors
    Contains the enumerations of HTML and GWT Material colors, to consume out-of-the-box, and utilities to create and manage own colors and classes to define gradients of patterns for charts.

    • Uses of Color in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors declared as Color 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Color Color.CHARBA
      Main color linked to CHARBA, #f27173.
